c:complexType.name: StackedAreaChart
c:complexType.c:documentation: The options documentation class of the Stacked Area chart.

c:property.name: point
c:property.c:documentation: The point plot is the main plot of the stacked area chart, which means that its properties may be used without the "point" property suffix.

c:complexType.name: StackedAreaPlot
c:complexType.c:documentation: The options documentation class of the stacked area plot.

c:property.name: stacked
c:property.c:documentation: This plot type is necessarily stacked.

c:property.name: areasVisible
c:property.c:documentation: This plot type necessarily shows shaded areas connecting visual elements.
